Resubmitting my email after speaking with your abuse personnel who now
inform me that I also need to submit this to your Legal department. See
attached and see my email message sent to your Abuse department on
10/30/06. 
 
  
 
You are CONNECTED to and are supplying services for the web address
933.DUTS.AT which is infringing on our company's registered trademark
INVEST N RETIRE. 
 
  
 
Please, take immediate and appropriate action to desist from this
infringement. A response would be appreciated. 
 
  
 
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Carol Abrahamson, COO 
 
Invest n Retire LLC 
 
506 SW 6th Ave. Suite 1200
Portland OR 97204
503-419-2894 x 101
carol@investnretire.com 
 
www.investnretire.com <http://www.investnretire.com/>
--------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 
  
 
  
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Carol Abrahamson
Sent: Monday, October 30, 2006 2:27 PM
To: Planet (abuse@theplanet.com)
Subject: Registered TradeMark Infringement 
 
  
 
Company: Invest n Retire, LLC 
 
Registered trademark: INVEST N RETIRE(r) 
 
Registration number: 3115265  
 
Registration date: July 11, 2006 
 
  
 
I contacted your company today to report an infringement on our
company's registered trademark.  
 
  
 
You are hosting an address 933.DUTS.AT which displayed the information
below. The use of our registered trademark is a trademark infringement
and I am requesting that you take immediate and appropriate action to
rectify the infringement. See attached document which led me to your
company as the hosting company for the WEB site that is infringing on
our trademark. 
 
  
 
Please confirm that the appropriate action has been taken. Carol
Abrahamson, COO, Invest n Retire, LLC 
 
  
 
  
 
 
Invest N Retire <http://993.duts.at/%25url%25>  
 
 
Monday, July 24, 2006
